snippet: Ayman Mohyeldin was reinstated by the network after he was removed following postings on Twitter that stirred controversy, although NBC did not make any public comment.
abstract: NBC says correspondent Ayman Mohyeldin will be reinstated and sent back to Gaza, only days after it removed him from coverage of fighting there; decision to pull Mohyeldin off story, which some speculate was because he may have showed too much empathy for Gaza residents in his comments on Twitter, prompted much criticism of NBC.
lead_paragraph: Ayman Mohyeldin was reinstated by the network after he was removed following postings on Twitter that stirred controversy, although NBC did not make any public comment.

headline.main: NBC Correspondent Ayman Mohyeldin Is Returned to Gaza
headline.print_headline: NBC Decides to Return Ousted Reporter to Gaza
